title: Eliud Kipchoge: The humble home life in rural Kenya behind remarkable athletic success
description: Witnessing Eliud Kipchoge's humble home life in rural Kenya sheds light on some of the secrets behind his remarkable athletic success.
content:
Kipchoge can be joined by 50 or more other athletes on weekly long runs
In the lush green gardens of Eliud Kipchoge's training retreat in the Kenyan highlands, the greatest distance runner of all time is describing the dusty beginnings to his sparkling caree… [+13578 chars]
